meanings.definition: Cause physical pain or injury to.
meanings.sent1: Running into a wall hurts my head.
meanings.sent2: Falling off a bike hurts your knees.
meanings.sent3: Tickling someone too much hurts their stomach.
meanings.sent4: The truth hurts like a sharp knife.
meanings.sent5: The burn hurts so much I can't think straight.

meanings.sent1: When I fall, it hurts my back.
meanings.sent2: If you touch fire, it hurts your hand.
meanings.sent3: Eating too much ice cream hurts my teeth.
meanings.sent4: The loss hurts like a deep wound.
meanings.sent5: The sting hurts more than I expected.

meanings.definition: Mental or emotional pain or suffering.
meanings.sent1: Seeing them leave hurts my heart.
meanings.sent2: Losing a friend hurts your feelings.
meanings.sent3: Forgetting your birthday hurts my brain.
meanings.sent4: The betrayal hurts like a heavy burden.
